install.name: System - Piwik Anlaytics
install.author: Jonathan Leek
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Jonathan Leek. All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin will place the Piwik tracking code in your website. You will need to enable and configure the plugin after installation.

param.name: path
param.label: Piwik Path
param.description: This is the full URL to your Piwik installation excluding the protocol. (ex: www.your_piwik_instance.com/path/).

param.name: site_id
param.label: Piwik Site ID
param.description: The Piwik ID for this website.

field.name: path
field.label: Piwik Path
field.description: This is the full URL to your Piwik installation. (ex: http://www.your_piwik_instance.com/path/).

field.name: site_id
field.label: Piwik Site ID
field.description: The Piwik ID for this website.
